quotes.quote: Any fool can be happy. It takes a man with real heart to make beauty out of the stuff that makes us weep.
It doesn’t matter how strong or capable you are; if you don’t have a big heart, you will not succeed.
Little hearts, little souls give little lusts big power. Big hearts give little lusts little power.
Big head, target for enemy; big heart, target for friend.
One day we will realize that big hearts will bring us more peace than big weapons.
You need a high degree of corruption or a very big heart to love absolutely everything.
A big heart is both a clunky and a delicate thing; it doesn't protect itself and it doesn't hide. It stands out, like a baby's fontanel, where you can see the soul pulse through.
A small ego equals a big heart.
If your heart was as big as your mouth you'd be real.
By association with nature's enormities, a man's heart may truly grow big also.
Have a big enough heart to love unconditionally, and a broad enough mind to embrace the differences that make each of us unique.
Don't judge a person by how important he is or how big he is. Judge a person by the strength of character or size of his heart.
Even when you do not feel big hearted, you can give yourself permission to act that way.
You cannot be a Big person with a Small heart.
The less you open your heart, the more your heart suffers.
Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.
The human heart is bigger than the world.
When somebody elses happiness makes you happy, it means you are a person with a big heart.
You have to show people how much you care about them before you can teach them anything.
People do not care how much you know until they know how much you care.
No one has ever become poor by giving.
